# Fragment Normalization Test

URLs with fragments (#section) should be normalized for deduplication.

## Section Linking

The specification [1] defines the core concepts, particularly the data model [1].
We also reference the API section [1] and the examples [1].

## Implementation Notes

Following the specification [1], we implement the data model [1] with
attention to the API details [1] and practical examples [1].

## Cross-References

The core specification [1] is essential, along with the data model [1],
API reference [1], and examples [1].
